title: Accessibility Implementation Status
details:
## Accessibility and Keyboard Navigation Task - Implementation Progress

1. **ARIA Grid Structure Fixed**
   - AccessibleCalendar.tsx now has proper ARIA grid with row hierarchy
   - Resolved "aria-required-parent" violations for calendar gridcells
   - Calendar header structure implemented with proper navigation labels

2. **Role Conflicts Resolved**
   - Removed conflicting role="status" from button energy indicators  
   - Fixed aria-constants.ts to use data attributes instead of roles
   - Added proper type="button" attributes to prevent form submission

3. **Color Contrast & Visual Design**
   - Created comprehensive accessibility.css with WCAG 2.2 AA compliant colors
   - Enhanced globals.css with accessibility-focused design tokens
   - Implemented high contrast mode and reduced motion support
   - Added proper focus indicators with 3px outlines and 2px offset

4. **Landmark Structure Implementation**
   - Added proper semantic landmarks to layout.tsx (nav, main, footer)
   - Implemented skip links for keyboard navigation
   - Enhanced navigation with aria-labels and proper hierarchy

5. **Component Architecture**
   - Fixed CalendarHeader.tsx syntax errors and ARIA implementation
   - Enhanced accessibility testing utilities
   - Integrated screen reader announcements and live regions
